issue.title: [C++] Convert underscores to hyphens in example executable names too
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15625](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15625). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While test executable names use dashes, examples use underscores. We could convert them to be consistent, like what was done in ARROW-4648.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15625?focusedCommentId=17501043) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12552
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12552>
